languages.text: "Говорят, этот проповедник из моровой ямы пришел. Вроде как подыхал от пустотной проказы, но на него сошла благодать, и он проповедовать стал".

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, этот новый священник из моровой ямы пришел. Вроде как подыхал от пустотной проказы, но на него сошла благодать, и он проповедовать стал".

languages.text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, этот проповедник из моровой ямы пришел. Вроде как подыхал от пустотной проказы, но на него сошла благодать, и он проповедовать стал".

traits.locale_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
"They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
"They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
"They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
"They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

languages.text: «Dicen que el predicador surgió del pozo de pestilencia. La lepra del vacío lo estaba matando, pero entonces tuvo una revelación divina y empezó a predicar».
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que el predicador surgió del pozo de pestilencia. La lepra del vacío lo estaba matando, pero entonces tuvo una revelación divina y empezó a predicar».

languages.text: 「このプリーチャーは疫病の穴から来たと言われている。彼は空虚なハンセン病で死にかけていたが、恵みが彼に臨み、説教を始めた」
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

traits.locale_text: 「このプリーチャーは疫病の穴から来たと言われている。彼は空虚なハンセン病で死にかけていたが、恵みが彼に臨み、説教を始めた」

languages.text: “大家都说，这个布道士就是从疫病坑里爬出来的。当时他患了虚空麻风病，眼看着就要病死了，但他得到了神明的恩典，于是便开始传道了。”
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

traits.locale_text: “大家都说，这个布道士就是从疫病坑里爬出来的。当时他患了虚空麻风病，眼看着就要病死了，但他得到了神明的恩典，于是便开始传道了。”

languages.text: "Es heißt, dieser Prediger ist einer Pestgrube entstiegen. Er litt an Leerenlepra, ehe er Gnade erlangte und zu predigen begann."
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt, dieser Prediger ist einer Pestgrube entstiegen. Er litt an Leerenlepra, ehe er Gnade erlangte und zu predigen begann."

languages.text: « On raconte que ce prêcheur vient tout droit de la fosse aux pestilences. Il allait mourir de la lèpre du vide quand il a été touché par la grâce et s'est mis à prêcher la bonne parole. »
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."

traits.locale_text: « On raconte que ce prédicateur vient tout droit de la fosse aux pestilences. Il allait mourir de la lèpre du vide quand il a été touché par la grâce et s'est mis à prêcher la bonne parole. »

languages.text: "Dediklerine göre bu vaiz, veba çukurundan gelmiş. Uçsuz cüzzamından ötürü bir ayağı çukurdaymış ama üzerine nur inmiş ve vaizliğe başlamış."
languages.original_text: "They say this preacher came from the pestilence pit. He was dying of void leprosy, but grace came upon him and he started preaching."
